nodes.text: B'Thazoshe Bridge was a rock formation in the Jundland Wastes on Tatooine. Formed by ancient drainage channels, B'Thazoshe Bridge was the largest natural bridge on the planet, and it was considered sacred by the native Tusken Raiders. In Galactic Basic Standard, "B'Thazoshe" translated to "bantha horn turned to stone." According to Tusken superstition, it was bad luck to not release blaster bolts before passing through the Bridge.
